name: Hot Wings (TeamSpicyHoneyDew)
description: Hot Wings is a post apocalyptic brawler in which you play as the chicken Hot Wings. You must constantly fight against endless waves of aliens to defend her farm. You can consume various peppers around the map so that they may gain special powers. You may use these powers to defeat the 5 different enemy types. Some pepper powers are more powerful against specific enemies than others. Good Luck!
